snippet: German diplomats made clear that they had reservations about giving the central bank such powers because it might alter monetary policy to make supervision easier.
abstract: Germany expresses serious reservations about deal under which European Central Bank would oversee group of about 150 major banks as part of effort to stem cycle of sovereign debt crises.
lead_paragraph: German diplomats made clear that they had reservations about giving the central bank such powers because it might alter monetary policy to make supervision easier.

headline.main: New Concerns From Germany Over European Banking Supervisor
headline.print_headline:
Germany Stirs Doubt
On Overseer
For Banking
